title: 2415 College Ave, Spacious 1BD's w/ private balcony, Walk to UCB
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.

2415 College, Berkeley, CA 94704, Multiple Units Available
2415 College Ave, Spacious 1BD w/ private balcony, Walk to UCB, $2,295.00
For an Appointment to View, please contact: Brian  mobile:
